description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Use your wits to defeat your opponents by getting rid of all your cards first.  With local and online play, you can share your scores and take on up to 3 opponents via system link, or through xbox live!
